metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11936 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
gdbus setgid privilege escalation

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11936` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
apport-gtk - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
apport-kde - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
apport-noui - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
apport-retrace - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
apport-valgrind - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
dh-apport - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
python-apport - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
python-problem-report - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
python3-apport - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
python3-problem-report - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: apport package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24').
